February feels like a month for change
#feminist is basically a derogatory word these days and it boggles my mind
And it's almost like the word #feminism has become another way for people to oppress others for their belief in women's equality.
Women's bodies are so different and unique and to try and fit them into only standard 0,2,4,6 etc sizes is bizarre.
I genuinely don't understand why body positivity is targeted & considered an SJW standpoint. God forbid we accept ourselves just a bit.
